website_summaries.verdict: This year's Samsung Galaxy Note 10.1 tablet picks up exactly where last year's model left off, making key upgrades to the display and internals while improving its core stylus and multitasking features, but it's still not perfect.
pros: Pressure sensitive stylus with useful software integration

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet - deserves at least 4 stars except for the poor Internet Browsing I experienced
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, feels great. Screen clarity is excellent, and love the S Note functionality to do sketches or 'whiteboard' type brainstorming. Using the pen is amazing. The only feature I found a poor experience with was internet browsing. Both shipped browsers - Internet and Chrome - do not appear to perform consistently, requiring constant closing of the apps from the Task Manager. These crashes were more prevalent when viewing pages with embedded multi-media such as videos. For example, I view bloomberg.com on my Samsung Chromebook just fine, but on my Galaxy Note 10.1, not so nice. Perhaps I need to try a different browser like Opera or Dolphin HD.
customer_reviews.author: J Alfred

customer_reviews.title: Very good tablet, with an excellent screen, useful S - Pen and good Samsung added software.
customer_reviews.text: Very good tablet: bell constructed though the position on the USB connector at mid bottom is awkward. Excellent screen: responsive, clear, bright and very high density of pixels. I like the continuous flat surface from side to side, without separate bezels. Very useful S - Pen that allows one to have very fine cursor selection and to produce drawings and hand written notes. It supports several Samsung functions that I find useful, if not every day. The multi - screen functionality is good, but it can result in very small font sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great battery life and brilliant for writing and reading.
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? I love it! It's brilliant for writing - I got a bluetooth keyboard that I connect to the tablet and take it out with me to the coffee shop/car/mountains etc. to write. The battery lasts at least a day when you write. It's lovely to have something bigger for internet browsing, reading books on this is a treat, playing puzzle is not a problem.. the display is very clear and has great colours.
customer_reviews.author: Michaela Siroka

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic tablet, I own an ipad 4 as well and find this comparable at a cheaper price the big plus for the galaxy note is in my opinion the expandable memory I have no hesitation in recommending this tablet
customer_reviews.author: SteveT

customer_reviews.title: A cracker
customer_reviews.text: Was a bit wary about buying this as it wasnt new. It is phenomenally quick. I wanted to use this just for surfing, email, twiitter news updates etc. I have a couple of games only. it starts and switches off in an instant. wi-fi is excellent. Screen is excellent would be very good for vids utube etc. Highly recommended and the s pen is a bonus for those who dont want to use fingers to start apps! Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: maurice m

customer_reviews.title: Excellent device
customer_reviews.text: Use it every day. Playing heavy duty games (kingdom rush) this can eat the battery up in ~3 hrs but for light usage and writing notes it will last days without a charge. Handwriting is responsive. Good for reading ebooks, so much so that I no longer have a kindle. It's an all round super star in my eyes. The camera is no where near as good as the one on my phone (SGS5) but I really didn't buy it for the camera so no issue for me.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Evans

customer_reviews.title: GALACTIC
customer_reviews.text: Everything you might want from a tablet. I use it every day and will never do more than scratch the surface {metaphorically} of its abilities. Outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: MALCOLM

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: After more then a year and daily use I can tell that this product is worth every penny you pay for it. Battery still last reasonably long and it never ever freezed or anything like that.
customer_reviews.author: Norbert A.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant produc, my little boy had a 8 inch Samsung Tablet for 2 years with no problems, we decided to buy him this bigger version & he loves it, its still a handy size for carrying around, but you have the bigger screen, perfect for his youtube watching & games.
customer_reviews.author: Apple Cheeks Little Feet

customer_reviews.title: great tablet, highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: item came really fast, and a great item, un like the previous version this one has stronger colour , and a stronger body , bought for my mom she adores it , greeat for drawing and evrything else, also has a reat camera, unlike the ipads this has hdr images, which is a new type of quality now available , highly recommende tablet
customer_reviews.author: jo

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic tablet!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tablet, which doesn't need the approval of the Apple geeks. The S pen puts it into a class of its own. That is the reason I chose it. As for bluetooth connectivity, it works just fine. Bluetooth devices have a connectivity button, such as the one on the battery compartment of the Microsoft Wedge keyboard. When this is activated, hey presto the device is connected.. At the price I got this from Amazon I really can't fault it.
customer_reviews.author: colin gordon

customer_reviews.title: Samson 10.1 tablet 2014
customer_reviews.text: I was debating between this tablet and the ipad air. I must say that I am very happy with this tablet so far.Still learning about the many features. The ipad air battery last longer and recharge quicker as my wife own one, but all in all very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: TV on demand is great. Battery life could be better
customer_reviews.text: Keeps me amused when I cant sleep. TV on demand is great. Battery life could be better, but I think thats a common issue with most tablets. Glad to avoid the 'Apple' club.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. G

customer_reviews.title: By far the best tablet this year!
customer_reviews.text: If you're searching for 10" tablet but don't know which one to get, don't look any further than here. I've owned an ipad, a nexus 7 and a nexus 7 2013 edition and this is by far the best one so far. The S-pen makes all the difference here, once you've used it, you'll never want to stop! The build quality is great, the screen is fantastic (I took the opportunity to watch avengers on Netflix and my jaw dropped when it got to the action scenes), so overall a brilliant tablet that deserves the price tag.
customer_reviews.author: Elliot Bate

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this Tablet and with the promptness with which it was sent, thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Responsive, quick, powerful
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tablet fast and responsive. Display is crystal clear. Battery life is excellent Even when runnkng apps that drain the life it lasts for a good while. Wifi catcher range isnt as good as some other devices. Such as galaxy s4 mobile.

customer_reviews.title: If you are a fan of the phones, you will be a fan of this too!
customer_reviews.text: Just liked the phones, you can't go wrong with this!

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant, my only worry is that the bezels are ...
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant, my only worry is that the bezels are a bit narrow and the device is a little slippy in your hands, otherwise perfect!

customer_reviews.title: This tablet is a keeper.
customer_reviews.text: What a fantastic tablet... does exactly what you want it to do the screen resoultion is brilliant one of the best out there. No complaints so far.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, its already been said
customer_reviews.text: Great product, its already been said. Qbit distribution had some delays in dispatching and actually only had the black in stock but delivery itself was quick and they packaged it well. Overall 5 stars for the product.

customer_reviews.title: ... was a warehouse deal and I am more than happy with it
customer_reviews.text: This was a warehouse deal and I am more than happy with it. The product is in the best of condition and represents a great way to buy. Well Done Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant!
customer_reviews.text: I bought my wife one for Christmas. She loves it; I love it more! Perhaps she'll buy me one next Christmas...? It's genuinely faster and lighter than the top i-pad, and the pull-out stylus is not a gimmick but is genuinely useful and adds to the ease of use.

customer_reviews.title: Still the best.
customer_reviews.text: Brought this as a replacement as my old 10.1 software failed. Couldn't find any alternative but even being a 2 year old model this does not dissapoint.

customer_reviews.title: Love my tablet but the battery has seemed to weaken ...
customer_reviews.text: Love my tablet but the battery has seemed to weaken over 2 years. (Probably normal) otherwise a great buy

customer_reviews.text: Everything i was hoping for from the tablet just one problem with the battery but that is to be expected. Using it for note taking is great, i just need onenote to catch up to make it perfect.

I am still exploring it and finding out what it can do

WiFi catcher range isn't as good as some other devices. Such as galaxy S4 mobile. I've been using it every day for the last four weeks. The screen is stunning, needs to be seen to be believed...

customer_reviews.title: SAMSUNG 10.1 INCH TABLET
customer_reviews.text: REALLY LIKE IT VERY VERY CLEAR SCREEN - GREAT FOR WATCHING I PLAYER OR MOVIES REALLY SIMPLE TO USE WOULD DEFINITELY RECOMMEND PERHAPS A LITTLE ON THE EXPENSIVE SIDE BUT WORTH IT.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap may not always be a good choice.
customer_reviews.text: The price was good and the package arrive on time. When unpacked, I found the manufactures seal on the box to have been broken, always unnerving. The product was for the Polish market, i.e. no readable English instructions. Normally I would of sent it straight back, but it was to be a birthday present for my daughter. So with nagging doubts in the back of my mind, I decided not to return it. All would seem to be well with the product at the moment. With hindsight and more time to play with, maybe it may have been more prudent to have spent a little more money, for peace of mind that comes from buying from a known supplier.
customer_reviews.author: daniel.wynne

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant tablet
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant tablet. Size and weight is brilliant. Features are amazing and what a screen. Battery life is great also. Definitely worth it.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Up to Date Tablet
customer_reviews.text: This product it perfect for my life and also at work, Ipads are good but extremely over rated, In my opinion this tablet is far better than the latest Ipad and you also get a lot more from your money. Samsung have done well.

customer_reviews.title: Best bit of kit I have ever bought
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, charged the battery and I was away. Only problem was the on line instructions which are difficult to navigate. I invested £8.00 with an on line company called "clove electronics" and they sent me a photo copy of the instructions in a binder which was great. Seems like these big names have stopped sending hard copies of anything but you do need them some times .All in all a good buy and very pleased with the delivery.
customer_reviews.author: ron ursell

customer_reviews.title: Great when working but unreliable
customer_reviews.text: When it arrived it was easy to set up and the operating system and graphics are great. However the first one died after a week or so then the second one died after 2 hours use and the third after 5 days light use. When working it is great but it has never worked long enough to make a more balanced view viable
customer_reviews.author: Alan Swinton

customer_reviews.title: Excellent piece of kit.
customer_reviews.text: My first tablet so I can't compare with other models. It took me a while to understand how to operate and get the best of it but now I find it really useful. The handwriting recognition system works well quite useful at times. Typing is slow but that is normal I understand and it is quite heavy otherwise great.

customer_reviews.title: Great for drawing
customer_reviews.text: Awesome device. I bought it for development and drawning. The pen feels smooth and quick, and the pressure sensitivity works great. I mainly use Artflow for drawing, but Sketchbook is also nice. A little to much pre installed crap cluttering the device. I'm not a fan of the S-voice either, and I don't know how to turn it off.
customer_reviews.author: Oskar Stålberg

customer_reviews.title: I am so pleased that I made the right choice compare to ipad air

The Screen Resolution and Dimension and Stylus's functions are what I have been looking for, very useful for day to day activities. Of note, would appreciate if S-Note app could have an easier access like a small collection of Color Palette as a 1 click tap to change the colour while taking Note or Drawing/Sketching rather than choosing the pen function and then select the colour.

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy if you want latest OS version.
customer_reviews.text: Love adding notes to PDFs with S-pen. Very annoyed by Samsung's slow updates. Android 5.0 Lollipop still hasn't arrived 1.5 years since release. Android 6 Marshmallow has been out since for 3 months, but I really doubt Samsung will update to it. I think it's unacceptable update flow for device with was top high end at the time of purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Valdis

customer_reviews.title: G note10
customer_reviews.text: Very nice little toy the wife loves it so much so im now sleeping in the shed.It's just what you expect from samsung top notch product easy to setup & use.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Good price
customer_reviews.text: 5stars. Excellent product. Good price. Early delivery. Can't fault it.

I'm sure there are other tablets out there to compete with the Galaxy Note 10.1, and of course it depends on want you want your tablet to do and how much you are willing to pay for, it but if you have the budget I would wholly recommend getting one. I haven't seen everything it can do yet but the reviews are promising.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent service. Really like the idea of nominating where ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent service. Really like the idea of nominating where I can collect the goods from that way not waiting in for the postman. As to the goods themselves will not know until Christmas day when the wife opens her present. Have no reason to believe to will be a problem though.
customer_reviews.author: B. C. Laverick

customer_reviews.title: Great device, the only issue being the ridiculously short ...
customer_reviews.text: Great device, the only issue being the ridiculously short length of the supplied charging cable and the design concept of putting the charge port underneath the device which arguably is a flaw in design. Beautiful screen and resolution, seamless integration between apps, very pleased with performance.

customer_reviews.title: super tablet
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Brought to read magazines etc, but already found many other uses. Not sure about battery life. My wife has earlier model which seems better

customer_reviews.title: Not suited for serious drawing. The pen works well ...
customer_reviews.text: Not suited for serious drawing. The pen works well but the whole tablet experience is anti-productive. Photoshop was not pre-installed as it should have been and it was also impossible to install it through the app-shop of Samsung. Support from Samsung was worthless. Had to send it back to seller.

customer_reviews.title: I purchased it unaware that the device only uses WiFi ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased it unaware that the device only uses WiFi (no cellular data). This has been quite an inconvenience for me (I don't have ready access to WiFi). Aside from that, it arrived in crisp condition with remarkable performance.

customer_reviews.title: Samsung tablet

customer_reviews.text: Can this be new? Battery barely lasts a few hours and I purchased it in Janunary as "new tablet" I didn't start using it fully until Feb and have missed the returns window. Can't type more -the battery's on 1% despite full charge today, and it's about to go dead again.....

product_meta.title: Samsung Galaxy Note 10.1-inch Tablet (White) - (Quad Core 1.9GHz Processor, 3GB RAM, 16GB Storage, WLAN, BT, 2x Camera, Android 4.1 Jelly Bean) (New Edition for 2014)
product_meta.description:
Watch HD movies, read e-books, thumb through photos, and more using the Samsung Galaxy Note 10.1 (2014 Edition). This tablet pairs a bright 10.1-inch, 2560x1600 resolution screen with Dolby Virtual 5.1 Surround Sound for immersive multimedia enjoyment. Front and rear-facing cameras let you take photos and HD videos or video-chat with friends. The included S Pen expands the tablet's functionality by offering shortcuts and translating your handwritten notes into text. Android 4.1, Jelly Bean offers an exceptionally smooth user experience, and an active battery life of up to nine hours lets you work and play longer.

GALAXY NOTE 10.1 2014 EDITION
AT A GLANCE:
 * 10.1-inch, 2560x1600 resolution display with over 4 million pixels
 * Exceptional performance with 1.9 GHz quad core processor and Android 4.1, Jelly Bean
 * 8 MP auto-focus rear camera and 2 MP front-facing camera
 * Dolby Virtual 5.1 surround sound for music, movies, and games
 * S Pen allows you to take handwritten notes and access shortcuts
 * Offers up to nine hours of active battery life
 * 16 GB onboard memory

SHARP 10.1-INCH DISPLAY WITH OVER 4 MILLION PIXELS
The Samsung Galaxy Note 10.1 2014 Edition features a 10.1-inch, 2560x1600 resolution display that has more than 4 million pixels--that's 2 million more pixels than a typical HDTV screen. The result is bright colors, vivid text, and clear graphics. Thanks to a pixel density of 299 pixels per inch (PPI), the tablet renders images fluidly and brilliantly.

WATCH MOVIES, TV SHOWS, AND MORE IN HD
Made for watching high-definition video, the Galaxy Note 10.1 has a 16:10 aspect ratio, so HD content fits perfectly.

BUILT-IN CAMERAS FOR PHOTOS, VIDEO CHATS, AND MORE
Equipped with an 8-megapixel auto-focus rear camera with an LED flash, the Galaxy Note 10.1 allows you to snap pristine photos and record 1080p HD video. The tablet also has a 2-megapixel front-facing camera for video chats with friends and family members.

And like Samsung's Galaxy S4 smartphone and the Galaxy Camera, this tablet includes fun photo features. Eraser allows you to remove photo distractions with just a touch, Dual Camera lets you take front and back photos simultaneously, and Drama Shot captures every frame of subjects in motion.

THIN DESIGN AND FAST PERFORMANCE
This powerful tablet provides fast performance in a sleek design that's comfortable to hold. It features a powerful Samsung processor for fast Web browsing and multitasking and longer battery life.

DOLBY VIRTUAL 5.1 SURROUND SOUND FOR RICH AUDIO
Featuring Dolby Virtual 5.1 surround sound, the Galaxy Note 10.1 allows you to hear audio exactly as it was recorded, making the tablet great for enjoying movies, video games, TV shows, and music.

My Magazine. Scrapbook. TAKE HANDWRITTEN NOTES AND MORE WITH THE S PEN
Included with the Galaxy Note 10.1 is Samsung's S Pen, which is a digital pen that allows you to jot down notes, phone numbers, search terms, contact information, and more right on the display. Samsung's handwriting-to-text engine automatically converts your written notes to digital type. The S Pen offers precise control along with access to shortcuts to a wide range of S Pen functions via the Air Command feature.

CURATED CONTENT WITH MY MAGAZINE
Built into the Galaxy Note 10.1 is Samsung's My Magazine feature, which you can personalise with your favorite news sources, celebrities, sports teams, musical artists, and Twitter streams. Access it from the home screen by simply swiping up. My Magazine provides an easy, convenient way to keep track of everything that's important to you.

MULTI WINDOW LETS YOU VIEW TWO APPS AT ONCE
With Samsung's Multi Window feature, you can place two applications side by side and use them both at once. You can drag content from one app to the other, or even open the same app twice--handy if you're writing two email messages at once, or you want to reference two websites side by side.

FUNCTIONS AS A UNIVERSAL REMOTE CONTROL
Watching television just got simpler, thanks to the Galaxy Note 10.1's built-in IR blaster, which allows you to use the tablet as a universal remote control. The Samsung WatchON feature lets you type in your zip code and cable provider to browse and search current TV listings and get personalised recommendations based on your viewing history.

FIND POPULAR APPS THROUGH GOOGLE PLAY
There you can find great apps for your Galaxy Note 10.1 tablet, including Instagram, Pinterest, and Facebook, along with special apps designed for the Samsung S Pen. If you like to doodle or draw, the pre-loaded Sketchbook app is the perfect creative outlet.

EDIT WORK DOCUMENTS WITH POLARIS OFFICE AND SHARE WITH GROUP PLAY
Finish up your presentation and enter data into your spreadsheet while on the go with Polaris Office. This productivity app lets you view and edit Word, Excel, PDF documents and more--wherever you are. And if you want to collaborate with a co-worker or share media, Group Play makes it easy to share presentations and photos over Wi-Fi.

The Samsung Galaxy Note 10.1 also offers a folder structure that will be familiar to PC users, making it easy to locate and organise important work files.

Sketchbook. GALAXY NOTE COMPARISON CHART

Galaxy Note 8 Galaxy Note 10.1 Size 8-inch TFT display 10.1-inch TFT display Colour options White White Operating System Android 4.1.2, Jelly Bean Android 4.1, Jelly Bean Processor 1.6 GHz x 4 1.9 GHz x 4 Display Resolution 1,280 x 800 (WXGA) 2,560 x 1,600 (WQXGA) Dimensions (H x W x D) 8.3 x 5.35 x 0.31 inches 9.57 x 6.75 x 0.31 inches Weight 0.73Ibs 1.26Ibs Battery 4600 mAh (up to 8 hours) 8220 mAh (up to 9 hours) RAM 2GB 3GB Camera 5MP Rear/ 1.3MP Front 8MP Rear/ 2MP Front External Memory MicroSD card slot: up to 64GB MicroSD card slot: up to 64GB 

BOX CONTAINS
Galaxy Tablet
Data Cable
AC Adapter
User Documentation
feature_bullets: A richer viewing experience with enhanced multitasking
Improved S Pen and S Note functionality
Samsung KNOX - comprehensive mobile security for consumers and enterprise
